The caption of the video translates to a: s silence on the situation in Papua and references the phrase "NKRI harga mati" which expresses support for the unity of Indonesia.
The video shows clashes between Indonesi: a region known for such conflicts.
A Google reverse image search using InVi: a digital verification tool, found the same video posted on the official YouTube channel of Tribun Timur, a media network based in Jakarta. The YouTube post provides more details about the incident, mentioning the attack on Indonesian military officers by a group named Serikat Mandiri Batanghari in Jambi, Sumatra.
